repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This manuscript consists of two texts Aghoraśiva: Pūjāstotra and Jñānaśambhu: Pañcāvaraṇastotra. According to the colophon of the first text, only can be confirmed that it is a pūjāstotra but according to Raghavan it is Aghoraśiva: Pūjāstotra. The left margin of the 1v is damaged so the information is lost today. The title Pañcāvaraṇastotra is found in the left margin of the 19r. The foliation is continues for both the texts. The last folio is written in three parts. Left side has a last line of the text and in the middle there are two lines written and then the right side, which has some matter in written in three columns and it is not clear if it is part of the text or is a description of the ritual. The text in the middle part of the folio is difficult to read.
ūparācaṃ daśalakṣakoṭi [4 unclear akṣaras] guṇapaṃkti [1 unclear akṣara] ṭa varṇyai śca lakṣaṃ [1 unclear akṣara] māsabha [3 unclear akṣaras]
sarvāgamānāṃ [1 unclear akṣara] nipaśyasaṃyā [A few unclear akṣaras] koṣa [A few unclear akṣaras] The trascription of the right side of folio is Column 1
kārikaṃ parā [4 unclear akṣaras]
egajaṃ ūta Line
indyauta
kāraṇaṃ koṭyaṃ
ajīnam taya
dīptauta
sūkṣmaṃ padmaṃ vyu [A few unclear akṣaras]
niśpa?dhaṃ toṣa na Column 3
dmaM [2 unclear akṣaras] mo

msItem.title: Aghoraśiva: Pūjāstotra
msItem.incipit: mumukṣussarvaṃ || vargastaṃ pañcavaktraṃ daśabhujasahitaṃ raktavarṇaṃ trinetraṃ bhālacandraṃ …
msItem.explicit:
……|| pa
rameśvarasya | śvasmineva sthanakaraṃ viḍargaṃ? rpanya saśaivaṃ padamabhyupaiti
ipro aṃga?badeśīyaḥ suriśaṃbhupujāstotrametat pavitraṃ siddhāntajño jñātāraṃ
msItem.finalRubric: bhurivektā vakṣenyanaṃ bhaktaye muktaye ca pūjāstotraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ ௳ ௳|

msItem.title: Jñānaśambhu: Pañcāvaraṇastotra
msItem.incipit:
ādityābiṃbamadhyastham raktamurtiṃ sadāśivam praṇamya parivāreṇa steṣye bhyar tamiśvaram || 1|| padmāsanaṃ raktatanunvinetraṃ śvetābjayuktāsahahastayugmam raktāṃ
barālepanamālyaṃ dṛṣaṃ sthitaṃ sabhāṃgairivasūryamiḍe ||2||

20 folios and
is blank as second text begins at
. i-

supportDesc.foliation:
Tamil numerals for the foliation. Continues foliation for the two texts. The extent of the each text is mentioned here-- i-
-
and ii-
-
.
supportDesc.condition:
Marginal damage is the cause of the loss of the textual information.
is broken at the edges. Some leaves are tuned brown at the corners.

handNote.desc: Difficult to follow the clusters. Letters are sometimes mixed that becomes difficult to read.

additions.desc:
nyo namaḥ is written on i-
in the left margin. As the margin is broken the text is damaged and it is difficult to guess. For the text 2 gurubhyo namaḥ is written in the left margin of the folio
.

104 is written in pink pencil in left margin at the middle of the folio and also in the left margin. A white sticker is in the right margin with typed number 104 and in blue pencil 55. The 104 written at the middle of the folio
which has damaged the original text.

pañcāvaraṇa stotram is written in the left margin of the folio
.

encodingDesc.p: Dots are used to show that the line continues.

TEI.text:
mumukṣussarvaṃ || vargastaṃ pañcavaktraṃ daśabhujasahitaṃ raktavarṇaṃ trinetraṃ bhālacandraṃ …
……|| pa
rameśvarasya | śvasmineva sthanakaraṃ viḍargaṃ rpanya saśaivaṃ padamabhyupaiti
ipro aṃgabadeśīyaḥ suriśaṃbhupujāstotrametat pavitraṃ siddhāntajño jñātāraṃ
bhurivektā vakṣenyanaṃ bhaktaye muktaye ca pūjāstotraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ ௳ ௳| śubhamastu |

ādityābiṃbamadhyastham raktamurtiṃ sadāśivam praṇamya parivāreṇa steṣye bhyar tamiśvaram || 1|| padmāsanaṃ raktatanunvinetraṃ śvetābjayuktāsahahastayugmam raktāṃ
barālepanamālyaṃ dṛṣaṃ sthitaṃ sabhāṃgairivasūryamiḍe ||2||
dīpacakrabātatapāvakisvarajapam |
